bullet: Can connect to Firebase platform to offload back-end maintenence to third-party, freeing up resources for front-end development
Using Firebase Authentication to manage Oauth-like connections using accounts from Facebook, Google, and others
Storing user data for web-apps on zero-config platform to keep focus on front-end only
name: Firebase
desc: I have built at least one app using Firebase to manage back-end capabilities. I know its overall workflow, which, among others, is to use a REST API to connect to a zero-configuration cloud-based database platform, and having the ability to use existing accounts from various platforms to authenticate users with no need for new subscriptions.
